de.unifrankfurt.informatik.dbis.dia.builder

Class QueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unifrankfurt.informatik.dbis.dia.builder.QueryBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateQueryBuilder, ExtendQueryBuilder

    public abstract class QueryBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class to serve a common interface for the both builder-types. The types differ as one is used to extend a given Query (ExtendQueryBuilder) and the other one to build a new query from scratch (CreateQueryBuilder)

    The QueryBuilder only produces SELECT DISTINCT queries.

    The QueryBuilder implements the fluent-interface so evers add*-method returns the same instance of the QueryBuilder (like the append-method of the StringBuilder.append(Object)) .

    See Also:
    create(Query), create(String[])

      • openOptional

        public abstract QueryBuilder openOptional()
        opens an OPTIONAL-Block. Every statement added after this call is placed into the OPTIONAL-Block, until closeOptional() is called.
